channel.title: Brisbane s calendar Light up Brisbane
channel.description: This calendar includes scheduled lights ups of Council assets including Story Bridge, Reddacliff Place sculptures, Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City Hall, King George Square, William Jolly Bridge and Tropical Dome at Brisbane Botanic Gardens Mt Coot-tha.

item.title: Oceania BMX Freestyle Championships
item.description:
Sunday, 23 March 2025

Reddacliff Place sculptures will be lit Blue to celebrate the Oceania BMX Freestyle Championships

The Oceania BMX Freestyle Championships is a premier BMX freestyle competition that showcases top talent from across the Oceania region. Held annually, and hosted in Brisbane for 2025, this event provides a platform for the best freestyle BMX athletes to compete and display their skills.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Light up asset: Reddacliff Place, Brisbane City
Venue address: Reddacliff Place, 266 George Street, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset

item.title: World TB Day
item.description:
Monday, 24 March 2025

Victoria Bridge will be lit Red to support World TB Day

World TB Day and the Light Up Red campaign raise awareness for Tuberculosis, the 'silent pandemic'. Every year, 10 million people fall ill with TB. Despite being a preventable and curable disease, 1.5 million people die from TB each year, making it the world’s top infectious killer.

This Light Up is organised by: Results Australia

Light up asset: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue address: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
item.xCal:description:
Victoria Bridge will be lit Red to support World TB Day
World TB Day and the Light Up Red campaign raise awareness for Tuberculosis, the 'silent pandemic'. Every year, 10 million people fall ill with TB. Despite being a preventable and curable disease, 1.5 million people die from TB each year, making it the world’s top infectious killer.
This Light Up is organised by: Results Australia

item.title: Make March Purple
item.description:
Tuesday, 25 March – Wednesday, 26 March 2025

Victoria Bridge will be lit Purple to support Make March Purple

Make March Purple is an Australia wide campaign supported by epilepsy organisations across the country and the national peak body, Epilepsy Australia. Make March Purple for epilepsy campaign helps create a community that is aware of epilepsy, breaking down barriers for people living with the condition. World Purple Day, held on March 26 is an international day of awareness in support of 50 million people living with epilepsy. myimpact.epilepsyqueensland.com.au…

This Light Up is organised by: Epilepsy Queensland

Light up asset: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue address: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
item.xCal:description:
Victoria Bridge will be lit Purple to support Make March Purple
Make March Purple is an Australia wide campaign supported by epilepsy organisations across the country and the national peak body, Epilepsy Australia. Make March Purple for epilepsy campaign helps create a community that is aware of epilepsy, breaking down barriers for people living with the condition. World Purple Day, held on March 26 is an international day of awareness in support of 50 million people living with epilepsy. https://myimpact.epilepsyqueensland.com.au/make-march-purple
This Light Up is organised by: Epilepsy Queensland

item.title: Bangladesh Independence Day
item.description:
Wednesday, 26 March 2025

City Hall will be lit Green with Red to support Bangladesh Independence Day

The 26 March is Bangladesh Independence Day and an important day for all Bangladeshi community members in Queensland as they celebrate the birth of the new nation formed in 1971.

This Light Up is organised by: The Bangladesh Association in Brisbane Incorporated

Light up asset: Brisbane City Hall, Brisbane City
Venue address: Brisbane City Hall, 64 Adelaide Street, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Library, Light up asset
item.xCal:description:

This Light Up is organised by: The Bangladesh Association in Brisbane Incorporated
item.x-trumba:customfield: Brisbane City Hall, 64 Adelaide Street, Brisbane City

item.title: Track National Championships
item.description:
Thursday, 27 March 2025

Reddacliff Place sculptures will be lit Green and Gold to celebrate the Track National Championships

Lap up the action at the 2025 AusCycling Track National Championships in Brisbane.
The AusCycling Track National Championships return to Brisbane, Queensland in March 2025. Watch Australia's best track cyclists ignite the boards at Anna Meares Velodrome over an action-packed five days of racing.

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Light up asset: Reddacliff Place, Brisbane City
Venue address: Reddacliff Place, 266 George Street, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
item.xCal:description:

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

item.title: Brisbane Cycling Festival
item.description:
Friday, 28 March 2025

Reddacliff Place sculptures will be lit All Colours to celebrate the Brisbane Cycling Festival

The Brisbane Cycling Festival returns for a massive and exciting sixth edition in 2025 from Friday, March 21 to Sunday, April 13.
Get ready for an epic celebration of cycling, with over 100 events and activities for all ages and abilities, both on and off the bike, including the Active Lifestyle expo and Tour de Brisbane. Stay tuned for the full program of events at brisbanecyclingfestival.com

This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency

Light up asset: Reddacliff Place, Brisbane City
Venue address: Reddacliff Place, 266 George Street, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset

Stay tuned for the full program of events at brisbanecyclingfestival.com
This Light Up is organised by: Brisbane Economic Development Agency
item.x-trumba:customfield: Reddacliff Place, 266 George Street, Brisbane City

item.title: Run Army
item.description:
Saturday, 29 March 2025

Kangaroo Point Bridge will be lit Red and White to support Run Army

Run Army’s mission is to promotes health, fitness and wellbeing through running support programs and a nation‐wide event; to fulfil our commitment to the wellbeing of our people and the community. We have now moved into a new era, joining forces with Queensland’s Police, Fire and Ambulance services to create one super‐sized community event. Our combined efforts will unite all those who serve the community in uniform as we collectively strive for health and wellbeing and care for our veterans and their families.
The event is open to anyone who can walk or run at least 5km and you can participate at the physical events in Brisbane and Townsville or the virtual event anywhere in Australia or the world! Why not come and join us?

This Light Up is organised by: NX Sports Community Foundation Limited

Light up asset: Kangaroo Point Bridge, Kangaroo Point
Venue address: Kangaroo Point Bridge, Scott Street, Kangaroo Point
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
item.xCal:description:
Kangaroo Point Bridge will be lit Red and White to support Run Army
Run Army’s mission is to promotes health, fitness and wellbeing through running support programs and a nation‐wide event; to fulfil our commitment to the wellbeing of our people and the community. We have now moved into a new era, joining forces with Queensland’s Police, Fire and Ambulance services to create one super‐sized community event. Our combined efforts will unite all those who serve the community in uniform as we collectively strive for health and wellbeing and care for our veterans and their families. The event is open to anyone who can walk or run at least 5km and you can participate at the physical events in Brisbane and Townsville or the virtual event anywhere in Australia or the world! Why not come and join us?
This Light Up is organised by: NX Sports Community Foundation Limited
item.x-trumba:customfield: Kangaroo Point Bridge, Scott Street, Kangaroo Point

item.title: Epic Walk for DV
item.description:
Sunday, 30 March 2025

Kangaroo Point Bridge will be lit Purple to support Epic Walk for DV

Join the Epic Walk for DV on Sunday 30 March 2025. Take a stand against domestic violence and help us create a sea of purple at New Farm Park in support of Women's Legal Service Qld. The funds raised as part of the Epic Walk for DV 2025 goes to Women's Legal Service Qld (WLSQ) to help WLSQ to answer more calls to their Statewide Helpline, provide more free legal appointments and reach more women when they need it most.

This Light Up is organised by: Women's Legal Service

Light up asset: Kangaroo Point Bridge, Kangaroo Point
Venue address: Kangaroo Point Bridge, Scott Street, Kangaroo Point
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset

item.title: Trans Day of Visibility
item.description:
Monday, 31 March 2025

Victoria Bridge will be lit Blue, White and Pink to celebrate the Trans Day of Visibility

Trans Day of Visibility (TDOV) is an annual international celebration of trans pride and awareness, that is dedicated to celebrating Transgender and Gender Diverse communities and raising awareness of the stigma and discrimination faced. In addition to this, the purpose of the day is also to celebrate our communities by being visible and proud.

This Light Up is organised by: Many Genders One Voice/ Qld Aids Council

Light up asset: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue address: Victoria Bridge, Brisbane City
Venue type: General Council venue, Light up asset
